title: Project A
description: Developed a full-stack hotel booking platform using MERN and an admin dashboard for managing hotels and bookings

title: Project B
description: Built a machine learning model to predict house prices using cleaned housing data, with experiment tracking via ZenML and MLflow

title: Project C
description: Designed an AI-powered waste reporting system with Next.js 14, Gemini AI, and Web3Auth, featuring automated waste classification and verification.
